verses.name: Acts 26:13
verses.text: At midday, O king, I saw in the way a light from heaven, above the brightness of the sun, shining round about me and them which journeyed with me.

verses.name: Acts 26:14
verses.text: And when we were all fallen to the earth, I heard a voice speaking unto me, and saying in the Hebrew tongue, Saul, Saul, why persecutest thou me? it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks.

verses.name: Acts 26:15
verses.text: And I said, Who art thou, Lord? And he said, I am Jesus whom thou persecutest.
